pages.title: Overchanting
pages.text: $(italic)Being so familiar with both magic and the Enchanter opened new doors for you:$(br)Overchanting.$(br2)Pressing so much magical energy into a single Enchanted Book will be pricey. Maybe even not even worth the hassle, in most cases.

pages.title: Spectrum Enchantments
pages.text: Clovers' Favor: 3 => 6$(br)Disarming: 2 => 4$(br)Exuberance: 5 => 10$(br)First Strike: 2 => 5$(br)Improved Critical: 2 => 4$(br)Inertia: 2 => 5$(br)Tight Grip: 2 => 4$(br)Treasure Hunter: 3 => 5

pages.title: Vanilla Enchantments
pages.text: Bane of Arthropods: 5 => 8$(br)Blast Protection: 4 => 8$(br)Depth Strider: 3 => 3$(br)Efficiency: 5 => 8$(br)Feather Falling: 4 => 6$(br)Fire Aspect: 2 => 4$(br)Fire Protection: 4 => 8$(br)Fortune: 3 => 5$(br)Frost Walker: 2 => 4$(br)Impaling: 5 => 8$(br)Knockback: 2 => 5$(br)Looting: 3 => 6$(br)Loyalty: 3 => 4$(br)Luck of the Sea: 3 => 5
